div.p: Codes defining the purpose of a Questionnaire item of type 'text'.
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/questionnaire-display-category defines the following codes:

tr.td: The text provides guidances on how to populate or use a portion of the questionnaire (or the questionnaire as a whole).
The text provides guidance on how the information should be or will be handled from a security/confidentiality/access control perspective when completed

description.value: Codes defining the purpose of a Questionnaire item of type 'text'.

definition.value: The text provides guidances on how to populate or use a portion of the questionnaire (or the questionnaire as a whole).
The text provides guidance on how the information should be or will be handled from a security/confidentiality/access control perspective when completed
